title: I wrote a book in a language other than English (in my native language). Can I apply with it to an English or American publisher without publishing the original in my country first? What are the chances of getting it published? - Quora

response.answer_text: The chances of your book eventually getting published into English are just about zero.  The American publishing industry completely hates books in translation and the American book buying public is even worse.  The British market is only slightly better.  There is one big exception:  if you've written some best selling crime fiction in your native language,  there is a good chance you could convince an Anglo publisher into taking it

In these days and times, why even go to a major publisher? Amazon and other places have it where you can self publish, and have the book on the largest internet book-store, now of course they get their cut or a fee for service, but you will have you book and less worry.
